text: Eddie Holman (born June 3, 1946) is an American singer and recording artist, best known for his distinctively high singing voice and his 1970 hit song "Hey There Lonely Girl". His specialties range from R&B; and pop to gospel. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:American soul singers Category:American gospel musicians Category:American pop singers Category:American Baptist ministers Category:Musicians from Virginia Category:Singers from New York City Category:Singers from Virginia
title: Eddie Holman
